eSearchResult.QueryTranslation: "muscular dystrophy, duchenne"[MeSH Terms] AND ("Anesthesia"[MeSH Terms] OR "anesthesia, general"[MeSH Terms] OR "anesthesia, conduction"[MeSH Terms] OR "Anesthetics"[MeSH Terms] OR "Anesthesiology"[MeSH Terms] OR "Analgesia"[MeSH Terms] OR "analgesia, epidural"[MeSH Terms] OR "Conscious Sedation"[MeSH Terms] OR "monitoring, intraoperative"[MeSH Terms] OR "pain, postoperative"[MeSH Terms] OR ("Anesthesia"[Title/Abstract] OR "anaesthesia"[Title/Abstract] OR "anesthetic"[Title/Abstract] OR "Anesthetics"[Title/Abstract] OR "sedation"[Title/Abstract] OR "Conscious Sedation"[Title/Abstract] OR "regional anesthesia"[Title/Abstract] OR "nerve block"[Title/Abstract] OR "perioperative"[Title/Abstract] OR "induction of anesthesia"[Title/Abstract] OR "general anesthesia"[Title/Abstract] OR "postoperative pain"[Title/Abstract]) OR ("anesthetics, intravenous"[MeSH Terms] OR "anesthetics, local"[MeSH Terms] OR "anesthetics, inhalation"[MeSH Terms] OR "analgesics, opioid"[MeSH Terms] OR "analgesics, non narcotic"[MeSH Terms] OR "Neuromuscular Blocking Agents"[MeSH Terms] OR "Hypnotics and Sedatives"[MeSH Terms] OR ("propofol"[Title/Abstract] OR "ketamine"[Title/Abstract] OR "midazolam"[Title/Abstract] OR "fentanyl"[Title/Abstract] OR "remifentanil"[Title/Abstract] OR "dexmedetomidine"[Title/Abstract] OR "sevoflurane"[Title/Abstract] OR "isoflurane"[Title/Abstract] OR "desflurane"[Title/Abstract] OR "rocuronium"[Title/Abstract] OR "succinylcholine"[Title/Abstract] OR "bupivacaine"[Title/Abstract] OR "lidocaine"[Title/Abstract])))
